projects.title: Social Network for Food Rescue
projects.description: In my final project for my B.c, me and my partner developed a React Native application tailored for food rescue, seamlessly integrated with Firebase for backend support. Our platform empowers users to share surplus food donations conveniently displayed on a map for easy access, by prioritizing user-friendliness and efficiency

projects.title: Recruitment Management Website
projects.description: Developed a TypeScript and React-powered website for the 'Gvanim' association, simplifying employee recruitment. With Firebase handling the backend, candidates can seamlessly submit resumes while recruiters efficiently manage job listings, interviews, and candidate status. live demo: https://gvanim-demo.web.app/management,  ( mail: admin@gmail.com, password: admin12 )

projects.title: Personal portfolio
projects.description: This personal portfolio showcases my skills and projects as a software developer. Built with Next.js and React, it emphasizes responsive design and modern aesthetics using CSS Modules. The site features project displays, a skills list, and a CV downloading option, leveraging Full Stack development for a seamless and fast user experience.
